import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../services/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private cartService : CartService){} ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } getCart(){ return this.cartService.get(); } }
